about_the_game:
This pack of 3D models contains a set of firearms that are usually used for hunting. ...And a Desert Eagle thrown in, just for fun.
Models included:
1. Benelli M4 Super 90
2. Browning A5
3. Mossberg 500 SPX
4. Remington 870
5. Remington 700
6. Winchester Model 21
7. Steyr Scout
8. Mauser 98k
9. Mosin Nagant
10. Desert Eagle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480, equivalent or better.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.
